summary: Immensely powerful Sorcerer of the Dark Arts. Self-proclaimed Prince of Worms, and Champion of Molag Bal; awaits the Dragonborn for battle.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is only intended for special use as requested by a friend of mine. It adds an extremely powerful Altmeri Vampiric Sorcerer to Hamvir's Rest, where he is slowly but surely raising an army of undead. Only activate this mod when you are ready to fight him. De-activate on new characters whom want to explore Hamvir's Rest without being shredded.


Requires both Dawnguard & Dragonborn DLC.
author: Velehk
